personal.elevator_pitch: I'm a Graduate Software Developer with a Master's in IT from Swinburne University, specializing in full-stack development with Next.js, TypeScript, and PostgreSQL. I've built AI-powered enterprise applications that reduced manual work by 20 hours per week and automated 90% of admin tasks.

salary_location.remote_experience: Experience with remote collaboration during internship and freelance projects
salary_location.travel_availability: Available for occasional travel within Australia

content_chunks.title: Personal Introduction
content_chunks.content: I am Timothy Kipchirchir Kanda, a Graduate Software Developer based in Sydney, NSW, Australia. I hold a Master of Information Technology with a Software Development specialisation from Swinburne University of Technology. I'm passionate about building full-stack, cloud-deployed applications with a focus on clean architecture, reliability, and real-world impact.

content_chunks.title: Professional Summary
content_chunks.content: Graduate Software Developer with a Master of Information Technology (Software Development specialisation) and hands-on experience building full-stack, cloud-deployed applications. Experienced across the full SDLC, including data-intensive systems, automation, and AI-assisted workflows. Strong focus on clean architecture, reliability, and real-world impact. I'm seeking roles as a Graduate Software Developer, Junior Software Developer, Full-Stack Developer, or Backend-Focused Software Developer.

content_chunks.title: Education Background
content_chunks.content: I completed my Master of Information Technology with a Software Development specialisation from Swinburne University of Technology in Sydney, Australia in September 2025. My coursework covered software engineering principles, database systems, cloud computing, and agile methodologies.

content_chunks.title: Frontend Development Skills
content_chunks.content: My frontend development skills include React, Next.js (App Router, SSR), HTML5, CSS3, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui. I build responsive, accessible, and performant user interfaces with modern React patterns and component libraries.

content_chunks.title: Backend Development Skills
content_chunks.content: My backend development skills include Node.js, TypeScript, REST APIs, Authentication (NextAuth.js, OAuth), and PHP (WordPress). I build secure, scalable server-side applications with proper authentication and authorization patterns.

content_chunks.title: Database Skills
content_chunks.content: I have experience with PostgreSQL, MySQL, and Prisma ORM for database management. I design normalized database schemas, write efficient queries, and use ORMs for type-safe database interactions.

content_chunks.title: Cloud & DevOps Skills
content_chunks.content: My cloud and DevOps experience includes AWS (EC2, S3, RDS, Amplify), Vercel deployment, and CI/CD pipelines. I deploy applications to production with automated testing and continuous deployment workflows.

content_chunks.title: AI & Automation Skills
content_chunks.content: I have experience integrating AI services including OpenAI API, AWS Bedrock, and building CRON-based automation systems. I've built AI-assisted workflows for matching, recommendations, and automated processing.

content_chunks.title: Full Stack Developer Internship at Employability Advantage × AusBiz Consulting
content_chunks.content: From April 2025 to July 2025, I worked as a Full Stack Developer Intern at Employability Advantage × AusBiz Consulting. I developed full-stack features using Next.js, TypeScript, Prisma, and PostgreSQL. I implemented authentication and role-based access control using NextAuth.js. I built dashboards, reporting modules, and CSV data workflows. I integrated AI services for automation and matching logic. I worked in Agile sprints with industry mentors and deployed applications using cloud platforms with CI/CD pipelines.

content_chunks.title: Website Manager & Web Developer at The Kenyan Diaspora Media
content_chunks.content: From March 2022 to Present, I work as Website Manager & Web Developer at The Kenyan Diaspora Media. I maintain and extend a production WordPress website serving the Kenyan diaspora community. I develop custom plugins and backend features to enhance functionality. I implement CMS workflows for non-technical users and collaborate with design and marketing teams. I monitor performance and traffic growth to optimize user experience.

content_chunks.title: Web Developer Intern at Kipdev WP Solutions
content_chunks.content: From March 2022 to October 2022, I worked as a Web Developer Intern at Kipdev WP Solutions. I worked across the full web development lifecycle from requirements to deployment. I implemented user registration and authentication systems. I integrated WordPress CMS solutions for various client projects and assisted with debugging and deployment.

content_chunks.title: AI Participation Management System Project
content_chunks.content: I built an AI-driven platform for managing student participation and automating project allocation. I designed CSV enrolment import and matching workflow with deterministic and fuzzy matching with human-in-the-loop confirmation. I built dashboards and compliance reporting features with append-only event and audit-safe workflows. The impact was significant: reduced manual work by 20 hours per week, automated 90% of admin tasks, improved allocation satisfaction by 85%, and achieved 99.9% system uptime.

content_chunks.title: Digital Twin Portfolio Project
content_chunks.content: I am building an AI-powered professional portfolio with RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) architecture using Upstash Vector for semantic search. This enables recruiters to ask natural language questions and receive personalized, metric-rich responses about my experience and skills. The system uses the MCP (Model Context Protocol) server pattern for Claude Desktop integration.

content_chunks.title: Training and Certifications
content_chunks.content: I completed a 10-Week Full Stack Developer Live Industry Internship with Employability Advantage × AusBiz Consulting in 2025. I also completed the Full-Stack with AWS Cloud Bootcamp from AusBiz Consulting in 2024, and the Web Development Program Bootcamp from eMobilis Institute (Mastercard Foundation Scholarship) in 2022.

content_chunks.title: Key Strengths
content_chunks.content: My key strengths include strong problem-solving and system design thinking, production-level awareness of data quality and auditability, clear communication and reasoning, and good judgment in trade-offs and scalability decisions. I'm recommended for Graduate Software Developer, Junior Software Engineer, Full-Stack Developer, and Backend-Focused Junior Roles.

content_chunks.title: Career Goals
content_chunks.content: My short-term goal is to secure a Graduate Software Developer or Junior Full-Stack Developer role where I can contribute to production systems and grow my skills. Long-term, I aim to become a Senior Software Engineer or Technical Lead, focusing on building scalable, AI-enhanced applications. I'm particularly interested in fintech, enterprise SaaS, and AI/ML companies.

content_chunks.title: Why You Should Hire Me
content_chunks.content: You should hire me because I bring a unique combination of formal education (Master's in IT) and practical industry experience (full-stack internship). I've already delivered production-level systems that reduced manual work by 20 hours per week and automated 90% of admin tasks. I'm proficient in the modern tech stack (Next.js, TypeScript, PostgreSQL, AWS) and have experience with AI integration. I'm a quick learner, strong communicator, and passionate about building reliable, user-focused applications.
